question: Who among the following was elected three times as president of Indian National Congress?
explanation: Dadabhai Naoroji is known as the "Grand Old Man of India". He was the first Indian who was the member of Parliament in the United Kingdom House of Commons between 1892-95. He served three times as a presdient of the session of Indian National Congress i.e., Kolkata session of 1886, Lahore sessin of 1893, Kolkata session of 1906, where the idea of "Swaraj" was used for the first time.
